setupitem.value: <rules> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Cursor State</source> <value id="1">OFF</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Fill color 1</target> <value>C0C0C0C0</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Cursor State</source> <value id="1">OFF</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Fill color 2</target> <value>C0808080</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Cursor State</source> <value id="1">ON</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Fill color 1</target> <value>FFC0C0C0</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Equals"> <source>Cursor State</source> <value id="1">ON</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Fill color 2</target> <value>FF808080</value> </action> </actions> </rule> </rules>
